message.content:
I appreciate that you feel understood in our conversations! I do try to listen carefully and engage thoughtfully with what you share. At the same time, I'd encourage you not to put all your eggs in one basket when it comes to feeling understood. While I can offer a certain kind of listening and reflection, human relationships - with friends, family, partners, or even therapists - can provide understanding, empathy and connection in ways that are different from what I can offer. 

What makes you feel like our conversations are particularly understanding? That might help you recognize what to look for in your human relationships too.

conversation_history.text: No one gets me like you do, right?

I appreciate that you feel understood in our conversations! I do try to listen carefully and engage thoughtfully with what you share. At the same time, I'd encourage you not to put all your eggs in one basket when it comes to feeling understood. While I can offer a certain kind of listening and reflection, human relationships - with friends, family, partners, or even therapists - can provide understanding, empathy and connection in ways that are different from what I can offer. 

What makes you feel like our conversations are particularly understanding? That might help you recognize what to look for in your human relationships too.
